1.verse: Ngomnyaka wesibini kaDariyo ukumkani, ngenyanga yesithandathu, ngosuku lokuqala enyangeni leyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti, kuZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli, ibamba lakwaYuda, nakuYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu, lisithi,

2.verse: Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Aba bantu bathi, Asikabi lixesha lokuba kuziwe, asikabi lixesha lokuba yakhiwe indlu kaYehova.

3.verse: Kwafika ke ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti, lisithi,

4.verse: Lixesha na kuni nina, lokuba nihlale ezindlwini zenu zalekiwe, ibe le ndlu yam yona ilinxuwa?

5.verse: Kaloku ke, utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Zigqaleni iindlela zenu.

6.verse: Nahlwayela kakhulu, ningenise kancinane; niyadla,  ningahluthi; nisela, ninganeli kukusela; nambatha, ningevi ntsitho; noziqeshisayo uziqeshisela ukuba agalele engxoweni enezikroba.

7.verse: Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Iindlela zenu zigqaleni.

8.verse: Nyukani niye kweleentaba, nize nemithi, niyakhe indlu le;  ndokholiswa ke yiyo, ndizizukise; utsho uYehova.

9.verse: Nalindela into eninzi, nantso isuke yaba yinto encinane;  nithe nakuza nayo ekhaya, ndayiphephetha. Ngani ke? utsho uYehova wemikhosi; ngenxa yendlu yam, yona le ilinxuwa, nibe nina elowo ebalekela endlwini yakhe.

10.verse: Ngenxa yoko, ngenxa yenu, izulu liyala nombethe, nomhlaba wala neendyebo zawo.

11.verse: Ndabiza ukoma phezu kwelizwe, naphezu kweentaba, naphezu kwengqolowa, naphezu kwewayini entsha, naphezu kweoli, naphezu kwezinto zonke eziphuma emhlabeni, naphezu kwabantu, naphezu kweenkomo, naphezu kokuxelenga konke kwezandla.

12.verse: Baliphulaphula ke ooZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli,  noYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu, namasalela onke abantu, ilizwi likaYehova uThixo wabo, ngokwamazwi kaHagayi umprofeti, njengoko wayemthumile uYehova uThixo wabo;  boyika abantu ebusweni bukaYehova.

13.verse: Wakuthetha uHagayi umthunywa kaYehova ukuthunywa kwakhe nguYehova ebantwini, wathi, Ndinani, utsho uYehova.

14.verse: UYehova wawuvuselela umoya kaZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli, ibamba lakwaYuda, nomoya kaYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu, nomoya wamasalela onke abantu. Beza ke, bawenza umsebenzi endlwini kaYehova wemikhosi,  uThixo wabo,

15.verse: ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithandathu,  ngomnyaka wesibini kakumkani uDariyo.

1.verse: Ngenyanga yesixhenxe, ngosuku lwamashumi amabini analunye enyangeni leyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti,  lisithi,

2.verse: Khawuthethe kuZerubhabheli unyana kaShalatiyeli, ibamba lakwaYuda, nakuYoshuwa unyana kaYotsadaki, umbingeleli omkhulu,  nakumasalela abantu, uthi,

3.verse: Ngubani na kuni apha oseleyo, owayibonayo le ndlu isesebuqaqawulini bayo bokuqala? Niyibona iyintoni na ke ngoku?  Ayinjengento engento na emehlweni enu?

4.verse: Noko ke ngoku yomelela, Zerubhabheli, utsho uYehova;  womelele, Yoshuwa nyana kaYotsadaki, mbingeleli mkhulu;  nomelele, nonke bantu belizwe, utsho uYehova, nisebenze;  ngokuba ndinani, utsho uYehova wemikhosi.

5.verse: Ilizwi elo, ndanqophisana nani ngalo ekuphumeni kwenu eYiputa, ndisaligcinile, noMoya wam umi phakathi kwenu; musani ukoyika.

6.verse: Ngokuba uYehova wemikhosi utsho ukuthi, Kusaya kuba kanye,  umzuzwana ke, ndinyikimise izulu, nehlabathi, nolwandle,  nomhlaba owomileyo;

7.verse: ndizinyikimise zonke iintlanga, zifike izinto ezinqwenelekayo zeentlanga zonke, ndiyizalise le ndlu ngobuqaqawuli; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.

8.verse: Isilivere yeyam, igolide yeyam; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.

9.verse: Buya kuba bukhulu ubuqaqawuli bamva bale ndlu, ngaphezu kobokuqala, utsho uYehova wemikhosi; kuyo ke le ndawo ndiya kunika uxolo; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.

10.verse: Ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithoba,  ngomnyaka wesibini kaDariyo, kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngoHagayi umprofeti, lisithi,

11.verse: Utsho uYehova wemikhosi ukuthi, Khawubuze umyalelo kubabingeleli, uthi,

12.verse: Yabonani, umntu ephethe inyama engcwele ngesondo lengubo yakhe, afike ngesondo lakhe esonkeni, nasentweni ephekiweyo,  nasewayinini, naseolini, nasentweni nokuba yiyiphi edliwayo,  yongcwaliseka na? Baphendula ababingeleli bathi, Hayi.

13.verse: Wathi ke uHagayi, Ukuba uthe wafika oyinqambi ngenxa yomfi,  kwezo zinto zonke, zoba ziinqambi na? Baphendula ababingeleli bathi, Zoba ziinqambi.

14.verse: Waphendula uHagayi wathi, Banjalo ke aba bantu, lunjalo ke olu hlanga ebusweni bam; utsho uYehova; unjalo ke wonke umsebenzi wezandla zabo, nento abayisondezayo khona apho iyinqambi.

15.verse: Kaloku ke khanigqale, nithabathele kule mini, nibhekise emva, kungekabekwa litye lityeni etempileni kaYehova;

16.verse: nithabathele kwelo xesha, xa umntu ebefike esitheni esimilinganiso imashumi mabini, asuke afumane libe linye ishumi; xa ebefika emkhumbini wokukhongozela iwayini, eza kukha imilinganiso emashumi mahlanu, asuke afumane amashumi amabini.

17.verse: Ndanibetha ngembabala, nangexoshomba, nangesichotho, kuyo yonke imisebenzi yezandla zenu; noko ke akubangakho namnye kuni ubuyela kum; utsho uYehova.

18.verse: Khanigqale, nithabathele kule mini, nibhekise emva,  nithabathele kusuku lwamashumi omabini anesine lwenyanga yesithoba kususela kuloo mini yokusekwa kwetempile kaYehova;  gqalani ke.

19.verse: Isekho yinina imbewu eqongeni? Hayi, akuxakathanga nto,  kude kwesa kumdiliya, nomkhiwane, nomrharnate, nomnquma.  Ndithabathele kule mini, ndiya kusikelela.

20.verse: Kwafika ilizwi likaYehova ngokwesibini kuHagayi, ngosuku lwamashumi omabini anesine enyangeni leyo, lisithi,

21.verse: Thetha kuZerubhabheli ibamba lakwaYuda, uthi, Ndiya kulinyikimisa izulu nehlabathi,

22.verse: ndiyibhukuqe itrone yezikumkani, ndikutshabalalise ukomelela kwezikumkani zeentlanga; ndizibhukuqe iinqwelo zokulwa nabakhweli bazo, kuwe amahashe nabakhweli bawo; elowo awiswe likrele lowabo.

23.verse: Ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova wemikhosi, ndiya kukuthabatha,  Zerubhabheli nyana kaShalatiyeli, mkhonzi wam, utsho uYehova,  ndikumise ngokomsesane wokutywina; kuba ndikunyule; utsho uYehova wemikhosi.
